title: "Microsoft backs $35M round into miniature AI chip startup Syntiant"
excerpt: "Microsoft Corp.’s M12 arm has placed a bet on Syntiant Inc., the startup behind tiny artificial intelligence chips for connected devices that it says is 100 times more power-efficient than rivals. M12 co-led a $35 million funding round into Syntiant that was announced this morning."
